ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinesis and Sinister returned to the Predacon base. Sinesis and Sinister walked along until they found Quickstrike. Sinesis was holding Lightmare and Sinister

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Sinesis and Sinister returned to the Predacon base. Sinesis and Sinister wa=
lked along until they found Quickstrike. Sinesis was holding Lightmare and =
Sinister was holding Gangon. They dropped them and then walked closer to Qu=
ickstrike.

"By the pit, we are bored! Got anything for us to do?" Sinesis =
asked Quickstrike, Sinister nodding his head quickly and insanely. Gangon g=
ot up and walked out the door. Lightmare walked toward Quickstrike.

"Qicks=
trike, what shall I do?" Lightmare asked...
----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: Talon Harvilicz 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, June 2=
1, 2000 4:24 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Quickstrike: 




  Quickstri=
ke shuddered after Dark Mouse kissed him. He backed away, shaking his head,=
 thinking: Oh, no. Oh, Primus no! Black Arachnia was going through his head=
. He still had hopes with her, yet he hadn't gotten the chance to talk to h=
er. 

  He bolted to Megatron, holding his head for a few strides, perhaps =
trying to hide the side of his face. "Boss," he said. "Why ah gotta go on t=
h' recon? Ah gots some more things t' run. Why not send him?" He pointed a =
long finger at Scorponok. Now he thought that going with Dark Mouse was goi=
ng to be the living Inferno. Slag. He ducked his head.

  Just then, he hea=
rd Shredder's comm-link. He jerked his head up. "Megatron! Th' pods here!" =
His eyes were large and bright.  He returned to his comm-link: "Good work."=
 He looked back to Megatron. "What we need boss? Ah got th' files. Ya need =
them?" He brought out three disks from behind his back, showing them to Meg=
atron. "Ah got th' flier in mind. Terrorsaur."
